problems.title: Sum of Array Elements (Recursive)
problems.description:
Given an array of N integers, compute the sum of all elements using recursion.

Input Format:
First line: integer N.
Second line: N integers separated by space.

Output Format:
Print the sum of all elements.
hintsList: Base case: if n == 0 return 0. Recursive case: arr[n-1] + sumArray(arr, n-1).
